data.title: Duke's Fuqua School of Business
data.text:
Mary Frances Luce is the first woman to serve as dean at Duke Universityâ€™s Fuqua School of Business. Luce has enjoyed a 30-year career as a specialist in behavioral marketing. Passionate about encouraging exceptional interdisciplinary research, she was recently an associate vice president for the Office of Research and Innovation, where she was committed to creating a supportive environment for Duke researchers in the areas of social and behavioral sciences, humanities, and the arts.

Come say hello

Regional Advisory Boards

Known for their industry expertise and relationships, members of our Regional Advisory Boards provide counsel on Fuqua's curriculum and initiatives while helping the school deepen our understanding of the political economy. Learn more about our advisory boards in different regions:

East Asia

Europe

India

Latin America

Middle East and Africa
